description: OAuth 2.0 connection for FAWRI API integration

instructions: 8. Copy and save the Client ID and Client Secret

step2_create_connection.navigation_path: Settings (gear icon) > Developer Space > Connections > + New Connection
instructions: 1. Click the Settings gear icon (top-right corner)
2. Scroll down to Developer Space section
7. Fill in the service configuration (see below)

notes: Replace <YOUR_CLIENT_ID> with your actual OAuth client ID from Step 1
Replace <YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET> with your actual OAuth client secret from Step 1
Update authorize_url, access_token_url, and refresh_token_url with actual URLs from your API provider
Update scope if required by the API (comma-separated list)
The connection name 'fawri_oauth_connection' must match the name used in the Deluge script
